author: Alexandra Hutzler
title: Jackson Says U.S. 'Greatest Beacon of Hope' as Historic Confirmation Begins
description: Biden has tapped the circuit judge to fill the seat being vacated by retiring Justice Stephen Breyer.
content: Judge Ketanji Brown Jackson made history Friday as the first Black woman to ever be nominated to serve on the Supreme Court after President Joe Biden tapped her to fill the seat that is being vacatedâ€¦ [+3168 chars]
